DbMetaDataKeyTypeManager.summary: Provides DBMetaDataKeyType specific data manipulation methods.

LoadByDescription.summary: Loads a collection of data records ordered by Description.

SetExcludeKeys.remarks: These exclude keys are only valid for the next manager data method call.

GetLoadJoins.summary: Creates and returns the Load join object.

GetTextFilters.summary: Creates and returns the filters object.

SetOrderByDescription.remarks: These sort columns are only valid for the next manager data method call.
